channel.title: Abouts on Draft Sethu Website
channel.description: Recent content in Abouts on Draft Sethu Website

item.title: Our Story
item.description: Founded in 2005 by Dr Nandita de Souza, a developmental paediatrician, and five other champions for inclusion, Sethu was born of the conviction that all children, particularly the most vulnerable, must receive a fair chance to realise their potential.

item.title: Awards
item.description: The pride and joy we get from our work is its own reward! 2019 ‘Best NGO Award’ by the Directorate of Social Welfare, Government of Goa 2019 Indian Association of Paediatrics (IAP) Fellowship renewed for 2019—2021 2018 Dr Nandita De Souza named Goa Today’s Person of the Year, 2019
